aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.bio: A Backend Developer specializing in Node.js with a focus on creating scalable and efficient backend solutions. I have experience working with technologies like the MERN stack, Nest.js, and Express.js. I'm passionate about developing innovative solutions and continuously improving my skills.

project1.title: 91Funds DeFi Platform
project1.description: Developed the backend for security features, including two-factor authentication (2FA), and a statistics dashboard for 91, a crypto investment platform that enables users to access expert-managed cryptocurrency trading portfolios through NFTs as a gateway.

project2.title: ReCut
project2.description: Developed a backend system for a video content platform offering legal access to movie and TV show clips in social media-friendly formats, featuring precise video trimming with a 90% reduction in processing time, and robust copyright compliance systems for secure content management.

project3.title: EcoSystem Dao
project3.description: Developed a backend system to support entrepreneurs by providing opportunities to meet experts, join assistance programs, and participate in hackathons.

discordClone.title: Discord Clone
discordClone.description: An application allowing users to communicate via messages and create group video conferencing rooms.

realtimeChat.title: Real-Time Chat App
realtimeChat.description: An application that allows users to create accounts and communicate via real-time messaging.

learnHub.title: LearnHub
learnHub.description: A digital platform that helps people find the right training opportunity based on their specific needs and objectives.

stressTest.title: Stress Test
stressTest.description: Developed a full-stack web application using Next.js and TypeScript that enables developers to stress test APIs with configurable concurrent requests, providing real-time performance metrics, latency analysis, and visual health scoring. Features include concurrent request handling up to 10k calls, detailed analytics dashboard, and responsive design.

internship.gpro.description: Designed and developed a digital platform consolidating information necessary for building a great career by selecting a professional course.

internship.satoripop.description: Developed a mobile application to offer users an immersive experience to follow match scores, events, and news of the Premier League.

footer.description: Full-stack developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences with modern web technologies.
